techmeme.title: Sources: Magic, a US startup developing AI models for coding tasks, is in talks to raise $200M+ at a $1.5B valuation (Reuters)
Snapchat adds new features, including letting Snapchat+ subscribers design a personalized house on Snap Map and send Snaps that last less than .5 seconds (Aisha Malik/TechCrunch)
Meta shares its research on Meta 3D Gen, a system that creates high-quality 3D assets from text descriptions in less than a minute (Michael Nuñez/VentureBeat)
Sources: Apple will get an observer role on OpenAI's board, with Phil Schiller chosen for the position, as part of their partnership announced last month (Mark Gurman/Bloomberg)
Responding to criticism, Figma's CTO says the Make Design feature is "powered by off-the-shelf models and a bespoke design system that we commissioned" (Jay Peters/The Verge)
